Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Description: A bloodied foe in range 3 must save or lose all vigor, then takes [D].

Actions.Name: Slice and Dice
Actions.Effect: May dash 1 before and after attack.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes in the area take [fray] damage.
Actions.Effect: The Revenant may teleport to any space in the area after this action resolves.

Actions.Name: Horrify
Actions.Description: The Revenant releases a bone chilling scream.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area must save or take 4[D], or 2[D] on a successful save. Reduce this damage by [D] for every character past the first in the area.
Actions.SpecialInterrupt: The Revenant can take this action as an interrupt when bloodied.
